title: (x) American Eagle: I'll love you... T-shirt - (ITC) Souvenir {Yves}
content:
Hello  
I’m looking for the font that is on this T-shirt. If anyone knows I would be eternally grateful.  
Gordon

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ilove.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=ilove.jpg) | 20.25 KB |
author: guajero

comments.content: It kind of looks like the non-ITC version of Souvenir that used to be around called Eastern Souvenir. I don’t know if that was ever digitized. Probably the more common ITC version will do.
